location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: PZ 3077/40 'Arabia: note on present position of the Ikhwan movement'

physicalDescription.extent: This file consists of a single document.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of a note sent from Sir Hugh Stonehewer Bird, HM Minister at Jedda, to Viscount Halifax, the Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs. The subject of the note is a discussion of the current status and situation of the Ikhwan movement.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs
